__prompts__.adr_number: Number of the ADR (choose the next free)
__prompts__.adr_date: Start date when the ADR was written
__prompts__.adr_upd_date: Date when the ADR was updated (on creation, same as creation date)

adr_status.draft: Draft - ADR still being worked on - no decision has been taken yet.
adr_status.rejected: Rejected - ADRs which were accepted and are implemented.
adr_status.implemented: Implemented - The ADR has been rejected. It's still here for history reasons and to understand why it has been rejected.
adr_status.obsolete: Obsolete - ADRs kept for historical reasons, but don't reflect the current or impending state of the codebase or project.

__prompts__.adr_tags: Comma separated list of tags - all lowercase
